about_the_game:
A sewage disposal is a great and revered profession! Petrovich and Mikhalych are working as sewage collectors, but one day, while dumping waste into a river, they are noticed by a policeman and now they need to earn money so that they are not fined. In addition, there is an annoying competitor who takes away customers. You will have to help Petrovich and Mikhalych to cope with these problems!

Drive the legendary ZIL-130 and listen to the radio

You will have to fulfill orders for the ZIL-130 sewage disposal unit, which Petrovich bought in his youth. And so that you don't get bored on the road, turn on the radio station with the best songs about the sewage disposal!

Fulfill customer orders

People need a sewage disposal at all times! The people of Paris (most likely not the one you thought of) constantly need your help. For three hundred pieces of paper, you are always ready to get to work.

Don't let anyone stop you from doing your job

The competitor is constantly trying to prevent Petrovich and Mikhalych from doing their job! Be ready to fight back at any moment!

content_descriptors.notes: The game has scenes of drinking alcohol and fighting.

name: Assenizator

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10+
  • Processor: 2.0+ GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10+
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-7400
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1050
  • Storage: 10 GB available space

dejus.descriptors:
Linguagem imprópria
Drogas lícitas
Atos criminosos

short_description: Become a sewage disposal worker and help Petrovich cope with all the difficulties of this difficult profession!
